meanings.definition: A type of tea, typically produced in China and Taiwan.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping oolongs in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various oolongs from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The oolongs at the party were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of oolongs was a treasure trove of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of oolongs filled the room, inviting everyone to try a cup.

meanings.definition: Plural form of oolong, referring to multiple instances of the tea.
meanings.sent1: We tried different oolongs at the tea tasting event.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed various oolongs for the customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The oolongs on the shelf seemed to be having a tea party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The oolongs in the teapot danced as the hot water was poured over them.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the oolongs caught my eye, making me curious to try them all.
